conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model correctly performs an isometric cutaway transformation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Solid isometric projection with clear wall thickness and volume. Minor perspective jitter in some corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Significant layout errors: The kitchen and laundry area are completely misinterpreted as a bedroom. The separate garage is omitted. Room adjacencies for the bathroom and WC are garbled.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is placed but does not match room identities; a bed is placed in the kitchen/laundry zone. Bathroom fixtures are vague or misplaced.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean but hallucinates floor text/labels in the 3D space, which causes visual clutter and deducts points.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen/Laundry area replaced by a three-bedroom layout instead of two-bedroom.
External garage from the 2D plan is entirely missing.
Residual text/labels from the 2D plan are rendered as artifacts on the 3D floor.

summary: While the 3D conversion is technically sound, the layout fidelity is poor due to misidentifying utility spaces as bedrooms and omitting the garage.
